mapper.sql:
SELECT u.id, u.username, u.name,u.password,u.salt,u.email,u.mobile,u.status,u.card_id,u.create_time, u.dept_id,u.comp_id,d.name AS deptName,
nvl(c.name,'总公司') AS comp_name, listagg(l.role_name, ',') within GROUP( ORDER BY u.id) AS role_name
ifnull(c.name,"总公司") AS comp_name, GROUP_CONCAT(l.role_name) AS role_name
FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_comp c ON u.comp_id = c.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, name, parent_ids FROM sys_comp) d ON u.dept_id = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role r ON u.id = r.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role l ON r.role_id = l.id

SELECT id AS "id", username AS "username", name AS "name", password AS "password", salt AS "salt", email AS "email", mobile AS "mobile", status AS "status", pwd_security_level AS "pwdSecurityLevel", pwd_update_date AS "pwdUpdateDate", comp_id AS "compId", dept_id AS "deptId", create_time AS "createTime", card_id AS "cardId", avatar AS "avatar", update_time AS "updateTime", update_by AS "updateBy", create_by AS "createBy", remark AS "remark" FROM sys_user

SELECT u.id AS id, u.username, u.name,u.password,u.salt,u.email,u.mobile,u.status,u.card_id,u.create_time, u.dept_id,u.comp_id,
nvl(c.name,'总公司') AS comp_name
ifnull(c.name,"总公司") AS comp_name
FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role r ON u.id = r.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_comp c ON u.comp_id = c.id
mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS "id", b.username AS "username",b.password AS "password" FROM sys_auth_user a LEFT JOIN sys_user b on a.user_id = b.id WHERE a.uuid = #{uuid} AND b.del_flag = '0'

SELECT b.id AS "id", b.username AS "username",b. name AS "name", b.password AS "password", b.salt AS "salt", b.email AS "email", b.mobile AS "mobile", b.status AS "status", b.pwd_security_level AS "pwdSecurityLevel", b.pwd_update_date AS "pwdUpdateDate", b.comp_id AS "compId", b.dept_id AS "deptId", b.create_time AS "createTime", b.card_id AS "cardId", b.avatar AS "avatar", b.update_time AS "updateTime", a.source AS "source", b.update_by AS "updateBy", b.create_by AS "createBy", b.remark AS "remark" FROM sys_auth_user a LEFT JOIN sys_user b on a.user_id = b.id WHERE b.username = #{username} AND b.del_flag = '0'
SELECT ur.name AS CompName FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_comp ur ON ur.id = u.comp_id WHERE u.id = #{id} AND u.del_flag != '1'

WHERE (l.id != #{roleId} or l.id IS NULL) AND u.id NOT IN (SELECT u.id FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id AND ur.role_id = #{roleId}) AND u.del_flag = '0'
AND u.username LIKE '%,'||#{username}||',%' CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
AND u.mobile LIKE '%,'||#{mobile}||',%' CONCAT('%', #{mobile}, '%')
AND u.email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')
AND FIND_IN_SET(#{compId},d.parent_ids) OR (u.dept_id = #{compId} AND u.del_flag = '0')
AND ${sql_filter}
GROUP BY u.id,u.username, u.name,u.password,u.salt,u.email,u.mobile,u.status,u.card_id,u.create_time,u.dept_id,u.comp_id,c.name GROUP BY u.id
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS id, u.username, u.name,u.password,u.salt,u.email,u.mobile,u.status,u.card_id,u.create_time, u.dept_id,u.comp_id,d.name AS deptName, NVL(c.name,'总公司') AS comp_name IFNULL(c.name,"总公司") AS comp_name FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_comp c ON u.comp_id = c.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, name FROM sys_comp) d ON u.dept_id = d.id WHERE u.id = #{id} AND u.del_flag = '0'
